alert.note: Alert for Dakota; Dixon (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 22 at 3:08PM CDT until April 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE LOWER BIG SIOUX VALLEY AND MISSOURI RIVER VALLEY BELOW YANKTON... The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Saturday afternoon through early Saturday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Iowa, Lyon, Sioux, Plymouth and Woodbury. In Nebraska, Dixon and Dakota. In South Dakota, Minnehaha, Turner, Lincoln, Yankton, Clay and Union. * WINDS...Southwest 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
